attributes.action: Automatic By-Election for MP Defections to Another Political Party
attributes.background: If an MP leaves their elected party, they should be  required to hold a by-election. This would allow constituents to exercise their democratic right & ensure transparency in representation, as current political maneuvering undermines voters' choices. It's time to restore peoples faith in politics.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which asks for the same action: "By-elections to be called automatically when MPs defect to another party" https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/737660
